result.arabic_text: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
result.translation: Abantu bo mu gisagara c’ibiti bitotahaye barungikiwe Shu’ayibu, hamwe rero n’abantu b’umwami wo muri Yemeni batazira Tubba’a[2]. Abo bose rero, barahakanye bivuye inyuma Intumwa barungikiwe, gutyo bashikirwa n’inkurikizi zo kutumva ukubihaniza kwanje Jewe Allah, Nca Ndabahana vy’akarorero.
result.footnotes: [2] Tubba’a, ni itazirano ryahabwa umwami uwo ari we wese mu bami batwara igihugu ca Yemeni aho hambere hahise.
